title: Ireland's 'brutally misogynistic culture' saw the death of 9,000 children in mother and baby homes, report finds
content:
1. Ireland's 'brutally misogynistic culture' saw the death of 9,000 children in mother and baby homes, report finds  CNN
  2. 9,000 children died in Irish mother-and-baby homes, report finds  NBC News
  3. Ireland finds 'appalling mortality' among children at Church-run homes  Yahoo News
  4. Ireland Report on Mother and Baby Homes Reveals Abuse and Thousands of Deaths  The New York Times
  5. Tuam: 'I need to know what happened to my brothers'  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 报告发现，爱尔兰的 "残酷的厌恶女性文化 "导致9000名儿童死于母婴之家。
報告發現，愛爾蘭的 "殘酷的厭惡女性文化 "導致9000名兒童死於母嬰之家。
